mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rosecrans, William Starke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 29 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 29 1861. Gen Hill forward me your despatch to Grafton asking force twenty eighth Ohio will be in Wheeling tonight please let me know what is the matter & I will send necessary force W.S. Rosecrans Brig Genl U.S.A 32D101pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William Starke
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
